examples.name: User Registration
examples.description: User registration process where system collects user information if validation successful then create account and send welcome email else show error message

examples.name: Payment Processing
examples.description: Online payment processing system where customer submits payment if credit card valid and sufficient funds then process transaction and send confirmation if card invalid or insufficient funds then display error and request alternative payment

examples.name: Data Processing
examples.description: First collect the input data, then validate the data format, next transform the data to proper format, finally save results to database

examples.name: Login System
examples.description: User login system if credentials valid then grant access to dashboard else show error message and allow retry

examples.name: Order Fulfillment
examples.description: E-commerce order fulfillment where order is received if items in stock then prepare shipment and notify customer if items out of stock then create backorder and notify customer about delay
